Contains_Milk_Proteins.note: Ice cream coatings typically contain milk proteins.

Contains_Soy_Proteins.note: Soy lecithin is commonly used as an emulsifier in coatings.

Contains_Peanuts.note: No mention of peanuts or nut-based ingredients in the brief.

Contains_Hydrogenated.note: Customer explicitly requested natural ingredients and no palm oil.

Suitable_For_Vegetarians.note: Natural ingredients and no palm oil suggest vegetarian suitability.

No_Palm_Oil.note: Customer explicitly requested no palm oil.

Emulsifier.note: Soy lecithin is commonly used in fat-based coatings.

Base_Type.note: Customer confirmed the coating is fat-based.

Legislation.note: Customer explicitly requested compliance with General Mills standards.

Legal_Denomination.value: Caramel coating for ice cream bites
Legal_Denomination.note: Product type and application inferred from the brief.

Calories_From_Fat.note: 57% fat content indicates high caloric contribution from fat.

Sample_Unit.note: Customer requested pilot batch quantities for testing.

Indicative_Volume.note: Customer emphasized high margin potential for General Mills.

Moulding_Type.note: Customer confirmed enrobing as the application method.

Shelf_Life.value: Suitable for ice cream storage conditions
Shelf_Life.note: Product is intended for ice cream applications, requiring freezer stability.
